TopicTitle: Anyone Have the Maps for Planets?

Articles.Content: Im trying to make a Kopernicus mod editing the stock planets, but using Kittobia screws the textures up.  Does anyone have the biome maps, color maps, height maps, etc. for Eve, Duna, and Laythe?

If i'm not wrong you can scan and then export to file different maps using SCANsat in game.

And take a look also at: http://www.kerbalmaps.com/

Edited March 7, 2016 by Blue_Eagle7
Thanks! It's been taken care of.
